items.content_html: Elephant Search Browser is a privacy-focused, lightweight, and simple web browser built using Electron. Designed to offer a seamless browsing experience with the default integration of Elephant Search as the search engine, this browser puts privacy, speed, and simplicity at the forefront of its features.
items.title: Code3rr0r/elephant-search: Elephant Search Browser is a privacy-focused, lightweight, and simple web browser built using Electron. Designed to offer a seamless browsing experience with the default integration of Elephant Search as the search engine, this browser puts privacy, speed, and simplicity at the forefront of its features.

items.content_html: TaskBoard is a lightweight task management application built using the PERN stack (PostgreSQL, Express.js, React, Node.js). It allows users to create, update, and delete tasks, helping them stay organized and productive.
items.title: firogute/TaskBoard: TaskBoard is a lightweight task management application built using the PERN stack (PostgreSQL, Express.js, React, Node.js). It allows users to create, update, and delete tasks, helping them stay organized and productive.

items.content_html: An AI-powered translation npm package for i18n JSON files. This package helps you automatically translate your internationalization files using AI language models while handling large files through intelligent chunking. Lightweight and fast.
items.title: dalisys/i18n-ai: An AI-powered translation npm package for i18n JSON files. This package helps you automatically translate your internationalization files using AI language models while handling large files through intelligent chunking. Lightweight and fast.

items.content_html: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.
items.title: diesel-core/diesel: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.

items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript application built on Node.js to fetch the current date and time from an NTP server. Features include Jest for robust unit testing, Docker integration for seamless deployment, and compatibility with Alpine Linux.
items.title: valorisa/ntp-ts-client: A lightweight TypeScript application built on Node.js to fetch the current date and time from an NTP server. Features include Jest for robust unit testing, Docker integration for seamless deployment, and compatibility with Alpine Linux.
